content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully constructed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for handling Automation Science Packs, but no Lab was eventually placed due to inventory shortages and crafting failures.

Instead, the agent has leveraged existing resource‐processing structures:
• Iron Smelting Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0)
  – Used to convert iron ore and coal into iron plates (inputs: 10 iron ore and 10 coal; output: 30 iron plates).

• Copper Smelting Furnace at Position (–27.0, –60.0)
  – Employed to process copper ore with coal into copper plates (inputs: 50 copper ore and 10 coal; output: 45 copper plates).

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Errors for get_entities
  – Use the correct function signature. Avoid unsupported keywords such as “radius” and supplying unexpected positional arguments.
  – Verify that the return value is valid (not None) before performing operations such as iteration.

• Lab Placement Failures
  – Confirm that a Lab is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
  – Check that the targeted location is free and valid for placement.

• Lab Crafting and Resource Chain Issues
  – Ensure all prerequisite components for Lab crafting (for example, iron‐gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available.
  – Address upstream resource shortages by first processing required smelting operations and crafting intermediate products.
  – Review recipe dependencies to avoid chain failures resulting from missing sub-ingredients.
